description: It's a ride around Skaha Lake.Using both the road on the east side of the lake and the KVR trail on the west side one can make a circuit around the lake. A relatively easy ride with some elevation change.Returning along a short portion of highway 97 one can encounter traffic.Bike shop / rentals: Freedom Bike Shop Accomodations: Summerland Resort
directions: Park at Skaha beach, find the road on east side of lake and follow it south to Okanagan Falls.Follow main street in Okanagan falls to where it ecounters the KVR trail the bridge.Ride the KVR back to Penticton, then you can find your way back to where you parked from the campground in Penticton
title: Skaha Lake Circuit Ride
